name: Super Bomber (itch) (maliceki)
description:
Defeat skull-enemies, collect powerups and destroy blocks with your bombs.

Controls:

  • WASD  - move
  • Space -  plant bomb
  • ESC - Quit

The goal for each level is to defeat all enemies in the level. Different colored enemies give you different amount of score points. Powerup also give you score points.

Big credits to MetalStormGames for providing this tutorial on udemy.com.
